channel.title: [pi] big wildy glitches ('S) [pi]
channel.description:
[code]hey guys, i recently added wildy into a few area's next to a safe zone. here are my glitches/bugs
1. if someone goes into wildy then runs back into safe zone it says there still i wildy and can attack anyone any where.
2. once you kill someone in wildy if you just let it kill them when the other player teleports back into the safe zone because they dies the person who was attacking just walks into safe zone and keeps killing them 'thats if they don't click anywhere else' it's as if someone just teleported back to home and the other player just noclips through anything to attack.
another thing, i have a friends list and ignore list bug, it's all there i can add someone to them but then it like kicks you and when you relog the player you added on the list is gorn. here is my cmd error
[/code] [22/03/11 11:02 PM]: Some-Scape Is Now Online.. [22/03/11 11:04 PM]: Testdude: character file not found. [22/03/11 11:04 PM]: REGISTERED: Testdude
~after adding friend~ [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4 [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: at server.util.Stream.readDWord(Stream.java:300) [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: at server.util.Stream.readQWord(Stream.java:305) [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.PrivateMessaging.process Packet(PrivateMessaging.java:22) [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:138) [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:975) [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:135) [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:110) [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: Unhandled packet type: 74 - size: 8 [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: Unhandled packet type: 180 - size: 0 [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 5 [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: at server.util.Stream.readSignedWordBigEndian(Stream.jav a:58) [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.MagicOnFloorItems.proces sPacket(MagicOnFloorItems.java:16) [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:138) [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:975) [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:135) [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:110) [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: Unhandled packet type: 54 - size: 0 [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: Unhandled packet type: 134 - size: 0 [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: Unhandled packet type: 54 - size: 0 [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: Unhandled packet type: 232 - size: 0 [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: Unhandled packet type: 239 - size: 0 [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: Unhandled packet type: 207 - size: 0 [22/03/11 11:06 PM]: Unhandled packet type: 114 - size: 0 [/code]
please help

item.title: [pi] big wildy glitches ('S) [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Any glitch can be fixed with the proper coding, yet there are plenty of tutorials on how to add safe PK areas and PK areas. I’m sure you didn’t add it right.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] big wildy glitches ('S) [pi]
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

im sure they can be fixed, i hope, it’s not really the friends list im worryed about atm its the wildy i wont to be fixed, if anyone can help please do

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] big wildy glitches ('S) [pi]

item.description:

accualy all the pis i worked with never had these bugs i suggest another source cuz its obvously screwed up

@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

[code]hey guys, i recently added wildy into a few area’s next to a safe zone.
here are my glitches/bugs

  1. if someone goes into wildy then runs back into safe zone it says there still i wildy and can attack anyone any where.

  2. once you kill someone in wildy if you just let it kill them when the other player teleports back into the safe zone because they dies the person who was attacking just walks into safe zone and keeps killing them ‘thats if they don’t click anywhere else’ it’s as if someone just teleported back to home and the other player just noclips through anything to attack.

another thing, i have a friends list and ignore list bug, it’s all there i can add someone to them but then it like kicks you and when you relog the player you added on the list is gorn.
